1.content:
The city zoo had just closed down, the last of its visitors leaving for the day. The zookeepers, satisfied, began to clean up for the night, making sure every exhibit was in proper condition; all the animals fed and with clean living areas, everything secure, everything as it should be. Once this was done, they too went home for the night. The sun was setting on the zoo. Everything was the same as it was every night.

With one exception: someone new was on the zoo grounds. Someone not used to how things work around here, someone unaware of what happens in the zoo once the sun sets and the animals are practically left alone...

But who was it?
1.title: The Sun Sets...

11.content:
Jeremy yawned as he stepped into the security booth, waving to the last of the zoo keepers as they left for the night. It was his first night shift, and he hadn't quite adjusted himself to the nocturnal life style he was going to have to adopt yet. Still, at least this job was supposed to be easy; just sit here, watch some screens, and report any funny business to the police. Worst he'd likely have to deal with are some dumb teens... not that he wasn't that far from being a teen himself.

Shrugging, he sat himself down with a cup of coffee and flicked on the screens as the sun began to lower in the sky, night approaching. It didn't take long for his easy shift to get... really boring. He began to dose off, vision blurring, only for him to notice something moving on a screen.

"God dammit... on my first night?" he moaned, looking out to see that the sun had properly set now. He looked again, trying to remember which screen he'd seen motion on, then groaned and got up, grabbing a flashlight to go and search the grounds. Hopefully it was nothing...

It wasn't long after he left the security booth that he heard something moving and turned his flashlight... seeing a strange figure staring back at him in surprise. He was stunned, having no words for what he saw. The other... 'person'... spoke up first.

"Huh. You're not the usual guy. Who are... Oh! Right, he retired, didn't he? Well, hi there! Nice to meet you!"

Jeremy just stared for another moment, trying to process what he was seeing. Before him was a curvy, anthropomorphic...

"There we go! I know this must be a shock to you, so please, let me explain."

The wolf woman then guided the stunned Jeremy to a bench and proceeded to explain everything she knew: that the zoo had some sort of spell on it that transformed the animals every night, that none of them knew the specifics of it but took the chance to enjoy a bit of freedom after being cooped up all day, and that a strange side effect was that they developed certain powers they all shared. She wouldn't elaborate on that last bit for some reason.

As she talked, Jeremy found himself becoming calmer around her. As weird as this was... there was something comforting about how kind she was being with him.

Then, just as he began to really relax, Cloud asked, "By the way, this might be a bit forward, but would you like to..."

1122.content:
Jeremy sat in awkward silence as he processed what she'd just asked, the relaxed atmosphere quickly turning tense for him.

"What?" he responded simply after a long pause. Cloud nervously chuckled at that, shaking her head.

"Right, sorry, that was too forward. I should probably explain. So, one thing we've found is that, for some reason, the curse on this place gives all of us one ability in particular: the ability to swallow large things whole and squeeze them into our bellies, among other things. We mostly do it to each other or intruders - we get a lot of people trying to break in, we think that's part of the curse too, that it just draws people here so that we can toy with them - but, you know, sometimes we like to play with our night watch friend."

She shrugged awkwardly, giving him an attempt at a reassuring smile.

"So, you're asking me to die in your stomach... because it's fun?"

"Oh!" she exclaimed laughing a bit. "Oh no, you won't die. I mean, technically you will, but you won't feel any pain and will magically wake up perfectly fine the next morning! Most people don't remember what happened here after they 'respawn', or if they do they just think they had a weird dream and never come back. But we've found that night watchmen always seem to be the rare exception of someone who remembers everything night after night."

Jeremy sat in silence, unsure of what to do now or to say. It didn't sound so bad, but was he really going to risk dying in some anthropomorphic wolf's stomach just to make her happy... and to satisfy his own curiosity, admittedly.

"You don't have to if you don't want to, Jeremy. I won't be offended at all. Though, I'll warn that most of the other girls are less polite and won't ask before grabbing you to gulp you down. I'd hope that they would go easy on you on your first night, but you never know with some of them."

Thinking it over, he finally gave his answer:

12.content:
Zoe sighed as she pulled back into the zoo's employee parking. She had left work only about half an hour ago when she realized that she'd left her bag inside and would have to go back for it. Sure, she could have come back tomorrow when they were open, and sure, she technically wasn't allowed on zoo property this late for some reason, but she figured that it would be much less of a hassle to just come in and take care of it now rather than later. Using her key, she slipped in, hoping to grab her stuff and go before anyone noticed.

Walking through the zoo in the dark was an eerie feeling. She usually loved working here, at least for the animals if not the people, but with no crowds or noises, it was just a bit ominous. Still, it was also a bit peaceful. If she wasn't in a hurry, she might have liked to take a stroll and just visit all of the animals. But she had a mission in mind and wouldn't stray from it. Thankfully, the building she left her bag in wasn't too far from where she entered.

However, before entering, she paused, hearing voices. Were other people here after hours? The only person that should have been here was the night watchman, but these voices definitely sounded female. Who else was here? Curiosity getting the better of her, along with the idea that she could catch some troublemakers in the act, she began to investigate, forgetting about her bag for now.

Hearing movement around a corner, she jumped out, turning on her phone light to catch the intruder, only to freeze in shock at the sight before her. The culprit let out a startled yelp and jumped before staring back at her, saying in a surprised voice, "Zoe? What are you doing here?"

Zoe just stared at the anthropomorphic woman, realizing that she looked just like a humanoid version of her absolute favorite animal in the zoo.

Tyler grumbled as he made his way over the fence into the zoo. Most of it was surrounded in tall walls to prevent exactly this, but some of Tyler's idiot friends had discovered this one spot where all that stopped trespassers was a chain link fence. But Tyler still scaled it anyway, knowing that if he didn't then his so called friends would make good on their promise to share an embarrassing fanfic he had written to everyone in school. He sighed as he landed on the other side. All he had to do was steal something from the gift shop and get out without being caught. It was stupid, but at least it should be easy.

As Tyler snuck around the zoo, trying to avoid being caught on camera or otherwise spotted by security, he thought he heard something. Voices? Foot steps? He figured there would only be one or two guards, but he was starting to wonder if there were more people here than expected. It certainly sounded that way.

Suddenly, Tyler felt a hand on his shoulder. Before he could react, he was lifted up off the ground with ease, a feminine voice cooing out "Oh, goodie! I found myself a toy tonight~!"

131122.content:
It was only a few minutes that Tyler was in the zoo that he heard a whistle, followed by a familiar voice calling out to him. "Yoo hoo! Are you lost, young man? Why don't you let me help you?" It was definitely Jackie. Her being nice to him the night before made him hopeful that she would give him the answers he needed.

As he came upon her, he'd note that she was noticeably thicker than before, likely from digesting four teenage humans into her magically enhanced body. She smiled down at him with a predatory grin. "Well well well, what have we here... Aren't you a tasty looking young-"

Tyler cut her off. "Jackie, I remember last night. I didn't forget like you said I would..."

That seemed to genuinely surprise the jaguar, blinking at his words. "... huh. Really. Well, that's unusual. It's not often that we get trespassers who are immune to the mind wipe, usually that's reserved for zoo staff. Still, anything's possible with this curse I suppose." The fun of teasing him all over again lost, she promptly sat herself down and patted a spot next to her, suddenly seeming a lot more casual. "Well, I take it if you came back despite what you saw, then you're not as freaked out as you let on... buuut I imagine you've got some questions."

Tyler sat down, a bit reluctantly, and chuckled. "You don't know the half of it... So... what can you tell me about this place?"

Jackie looked up at the night's sky and hummed, seeming to think it over. "Well... I can tell you that whatever magic this place has, it seems to have been around longer than any animal here has been alive. Dunno if it was here before the zoo, if the magic came with the zoo's construction, or if it got cursed sometime later. All I know is that every day, when the sun sets after closing, every animal here suddenly turns into a sexy lady with some degree of magical powers of our own and a more advanced mind. We have our fun with each other, toy with whatever trespassers the zoo draws in, the revert back to dumb animals in our exhibits once the sun rises again, only to repeat the process every night."

She paused, and Tyler asked, "So, what's up with the mind wiping?"

"Oh that? I guess it's to keep the secret of this place in tact. Don't think we'd be allowed to do this every night if any random person off the street could catch a glimpse of us and take pictures, do you? When the sun rises, any memory or evidence of this what took place here gets erased. Heck, I've even heard stories of some girls leaving the zoo at night to go on a rampage through the city, only for everything they did to be restored by the next day. Anyway, as you found out yourself, rarely we get some people who don't forget what they went through. Not sure why, but if I had to guess, it's because they belong here, in a way. You liked what you saw last night, right? Even if it was freaky, I could smell your arousal..."

Tyler blushed, and Jackie chuckled, patting his back. "No shame in it, hun! Just a bit of harmless fun! Only reason we mess with you humans the way we do is because we know there aren't any consequences and that, at the end of the day (literally), nobody really gets hurt. Plus, we have nothing better to do. All day spent as dumb animals, locked up in enclosures, surrounded by loud humans gawking at us? Then we turn into sexy, horny babes, full of intelligence and lust and hunger? You can imagine us getting a little stir crazy and frisky after all that, can't you?"

Tyler nodded, unable to truly imagine what they all went through. There was definite logic to what she said, too. He began to feel more relaxed about the whole thing.

Jackie leaned back with a sigh. "You know, it's nice to actually just relax and talk for a bit. I definitely like you, little man. I would absolutely love it if you decided to come and visit more often~..." she purred, pulling him close. Tyler blushed hard, smiling at the huge jaguar woman cuddling him, comforted by her presence just as he was intimidated by her raw power.

What would our hero Tyler do next?

13211.content:
Tyler was fairly shaken from the experience, having been turning into a late night snack for some curvy Gazelle lady. When he ran into his friends in the halls, who were wondering why he never returned last night, he simply gave them the hat and told them he ran into some difficulties. They seemed to take him at his word, and he was grateful they called off releasing the fanfic, saying they’ll delete it. Tyler sighed… he was a free man. But for the rest of the day his thoughts drifted from class work to what happened last night. So many questions! So, animals can walk and talk like people? And apparently a Gazelle, a normally herbivore animal, could eat him whole and alive, like a snake… completely digest him, and then magically poof him safely into his bed. How did any of that work? Although part of him worried returning would at the least get him into trouble with the night-watch, and at worst get him eaten again… he reserved himself to returning to the zoo tonight to investigate further and get picture and video evidence of these creatures.

Later that day, after school, Tyler thanked the heavens he had light homework. Being a senior in high school and a young adult, gave him a lot of freedom with light homework, and his parents were fairly lax since he wasn’t a minor anymore, they were a lot less controlling than in his youth. After dinner, Tyler told his parents he’d be going over his friend Robbie’s house to work on a science project and might not get home until very late. With that, Tyler went up to his room, stuffed his backpack with chargers and his dad’s old camcorder and some old digital camera’s and headed off to the zoo on his bike. By the time Tyler arrived the sun had been down for a while, all of the park goers and attendants had been long gone, and crickets were chirping in the spring night air.

Much like the previous night, Tyler crept through the opening in the fencing, and cautiously tip-toed through the dark zoo. Once again, he heard voices and footsteps, fully aware now of who they belonged to. He was much more cautious this time around, less-so for the cameras and more for the hungry and curvy animal babes. He crept silently through the zoo, taking shelter behind a large bush as he took this time to sit down, take a breather and get his camera’s ready. Just as he started to silently and carefully unzip his bag, a spunky female voice could be heard a few yards behind him, “I can smell you, human!”

His blood went cold, he was barely here for five minutes and he had already been found!? The voice continued, “Don’t play wise, human. I know you’re there. Do I have to come over there and drag you out behind the bush?” Yep, he’d been found!

Tyler fearfully got up and peaked his head out from the bush, there were three anthro ladies standing a few yards away from him on one of the zoo’s many concrete pathways. There was a huge, obese, BBW hippo woman, a curvy hour-glass shaped lioness, and… Gizelle!? Gulp! Once the predatory Gazelle and delicious human boy locked eyes, a big grin grew on Gizelle’s snout. She winked at him, put a paw on her hip and used the other to wave at him, “Yoo-hoo, long time no see, tasty!”

Her lion friend turned to her, “You know each other?”

Gizelle smiled ear to ear, “He’s the cute little sneak-in I ate up last night.”

She slapped her thighs, “Went right to my hips and thighs too.”

As Tyler ducked down behind the bush, he started to frantically get out his camera and camcorder… this was his chance! Meanwhile the trio of anthro gals leisurely made their way towards him. As Tyler was fussing with the settings to get the camcorder to go to night-mode, he was swallowed up by three towering shadows.

He regretfully looked up, lightly whimpering to see three grinning anthro babes standing over him triumphantly, Gizelle chuckled, “Back for more, I see.”

She peered down and saw his camcorder, “Ooh, what’s this?”

She bent over and snatched it out of Tyler’s hands, “H-hey, give that back.”

She examine the camcorder quizzically, “Coming back to snap some shots, huh? Ladies, I think we’ve got a little artist on our hands.”

The lioness moaned with a grin, “Oh, that right? Maybe he can snap some shots of my big butt in his face.”

The hippo woman interjected, “Or, maybe we can get a before and after of him outside of my belly, and my belly after I digest him.”

Gizelle nodded, “All good ideas ladies.”

Tyler chuckled nervously, “Um… I’ll just be leaving now. I’ve got a lot of homework to do.”
Gizelle reached out and grabbed Tyler’s arm in a vice-like grip, “Oh, leaving so soon? I haven’t even introduced you to my friends, and the night is still young.”

He wondered what he should do, dozens of possibilities swimming through his head, until he encountered his friends in the hallways again. He gave them the hat as promised, but before parting ways he mentioned that they should return to the zoo, and they should all go in. Obviously his friends pushed back, since they only sent him to steal the hat just to humiliate and scare him, there was no need to go back. But Tyler insisted and eventually they relented, some looking a bit annoyed at his insistence. That night, the young man ate his dinner with his parents. As they ate he silently wondered. He wonder if that Gizelle lady had her way, if she’d be the one at the dinner table, looking down at him, served on a plate with accompanying sauce and spices. He finished up his meal, did his homework for a bit and waited for his folks to go to bed. Even though he was legally an adult, his folks still didn’t let him stay out late… totally unfair, and the number one reason Tyler couldn’t wait for college, but that was a problem for another day. He slipped out his window and shimmied down to his front porch before taking off on his bike. In no time he made it to the zoo and found his friends there. The group followed Tyler through the opening in the fence into the zoo. Tyler seemed a bit cautious and skittish, nervously looking around, as if he were in search of something… or somebody. Tom decided to speak, “So… uh… you gonna tell us why you brought us here Ty?”

No way Tyler was about to become animal food a second time, he turned around and high tailed it out of there, his four friends were too focused on the large and in-charge gazelle lady to really notice or care. Meanwhile, Tyler ran so far he didn’t even know where he was going. Once he stopped to catch his breath he realized he didn’t even know what part of the zoo he was in anymore, excluding last night he hadn’t been here since he was a little kid… he had no clue where to go… or how to get out. Tyler started to panic in the darkness as he heard female voices nearby.

1432.content:
The small constrictor squirmed uncomfortably in his container. He had only recently curled up in the shade to sleep when he felt an odd surge of energy through his body. As if in a trance, he found himself leaving his bed and, somehow, opening his container to slip out into the cool night, the temperature seeming to not bother his cold-blooded nature as much now. At the same time, his body was rapidly changing, growing and gaining new anatomy that his mind was too hazy to process.

Finally, after several minutes of this, he rubbed his head in confusion, wondering why he felt so strange and why everything around him seemed so much smaller...

He paused, realizing that he was touching his head with a hand. He looked at it and the connecting arm, flexing his fingers curiously as he tried to understand exactly what he was seeing. He looked down, finding a pair of scale covered breasts greeting him, which confused him greatly. Weren't these for female mammals? And why did he know that fact? He looked further, stretching his neck to find he'd also developed a pair of legs, shapely female ones at that. He could feel a stirring in his nethers, his hemipenes transformed into a singular, humanoid looking cock, while a wet cloaca rested beneath that... or, was it now just a pussy? He... or rather she... wasn't sure, but she somehow knew there was a difference.

Shakily, she stood up, looking around in awe, realizing that she was now the size and had the stature of a human. This was bizarre for her, but incredible as well, as was the fact that she was intelligent enough to even think about all of this now! But why had this happened to her?

"Hey, new girl!" a woman's voice called out from nearby. She turned, gasping as she saw a towering anaconda woman slithering towards her, a massive thick tail in place of legs. The newcomer eyed the python up and down and chuckled. "Aw, man, you got legs tonight huh? Lucky. Anyway, you're new here, so I guess you've got some questions. Well, I suppose it would be neighborly of me to answer them for you. So let's talk, alright?"

The python, not knowing what else to do, opened her mouth and responded, speaking for the first time. "I'd like that..."

The two sat and talked for a good while, the anaconda introducing herself as Anna ("Yeah, I know, real creative. Cut me some slack, I first transformed as a hatchling so I went with the first name I could think of.") Anna explained about the curse (or blessing, as many of the animals called it) over the zoo grounds that turned any animal living there into a sexy anthropomorphic lady at night. She explained how, once the sun rose again, they would all return to their enclosures and return to being simple animals until the next night. And she hinted at the fact that there was more to this than just changing forms, but wouldn't elaborate further.

"So, now that that's all out of the way... what's your name? Or rather, what would you like your name to be?"

The python thought it over. She almost wanted to pick a masculine name, to suit his original form... but, in this short period of time, she'd already grown used to being feminine in this body. So, she chose a name that she felt would fit her well.

"Penny. Call me Penny."

"Well, nice to meetcha, Penny!" Anna said with a grin. "Now, why don't I show you around and see what fun we can get up to tonight~..."

15.content: More options for people after hours
15.title: Something else

info.brief_description: You make a discovery while at a zoo after hours: the animals become horny anthro ladies.
info.description:
Inspired by the interactive Anthros at Night: https://www.writing.com/main/interactive-story/item_id/1508675-Anthros-at-night

One night, you find yourself at the local zoo after hours. Why? Maybe you snuck in on a dare, maybe it's your first night of being a night watchman, maybe even you're a new animal moving into the zoo. Regardless, that night you discover that there's something magical about the zoo.

At night, basically all of the animals become humanoid and feminine, transforming and gaining new intelligence, as well as gaining some interesting powers. Then, come day, they return to their normal forms and minds until the next time the sun sets. What will you do, stuck in here with all these lusty, naughty, and potentially dangerous anthro ladies? That's up to you to decide.

Rules:
- Basically all animals become humanoid and feminine. Whether they turn into full anthro or something similar to their normal form (eg, a snake turning into a naga) is up to the writer, as is whether a male animal becomes fully female or just herm/shemale.

- Almost all humans will lose their memory of what they saw that night upon leaving, and any individuals who die during the night will find themselves waking up in their beds later, unharmed and thinking it was all just a strange dream. The main character will always be one of the rare individuals who does not lose their memory, no matter what.

ENCOURAGED:
Growth, expansion, transformation, soft vore, hypnosis, and sex.

NOT ALLOWED:
Gore, permanent death, toilet fetishes or other kinks focusing on disgusting topics, foot fetish, underage sex

Anything not listed is potentially allowed.

Put effort into your writing. This may be fetish stuff, but have some pride in your work, please. I may edit chapters for minor grammar and spelling changes if I feel the need to, as well as adding extra options to chapters with few of them (just because I can).

If there is a path you want expanded upon but don't feel like writing, you're free to ask me to try and fill it out. I make no promises.
